# iNZight Addons

Below is a list of available addons for iNZight.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
source('create_index.R')
tbl <- create_index()

# write to file:
f <- "addons.txt"
unlink(f)
apply(tbl, 1,
  function(x) {
    cat(
      "Name: ", x["Name"], "\n",
      "Version: ", x["Version"], "\n",
      "Description: ", x["Description"], "\n",
      "Author: ", x["Author"], "\n\n",
      file = f, sep = "", append = TRUE
    )
  }
)

knitr::kable(tbl, row.names = FALSE)
```
